net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_SavedAttacks_calculateDamage
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Calculate the damage that should be applied

arg(1) = The total damage recieved
arg(0) = Token ID receiving damage
arg(2) = damage type. Everything up to the first comma is used as the type
arg(3) = User option for this step
arg(4) = optional Save Roll Expression.
arg(5) = optional Save Effect. Only 'half', 'none' & a multiplier are supported

Returns an object
  {
    "damage": The amount of damage actually taken
    "applied": The string list of modifications applied to the total damage
    "type": The type of damage recieved
  }
